languages.text: "Справедливо. Да будет так". {n}Ахиллеас не пытается уклониться от удара, словно сам хочет оборвать свою затянувшуюся извращенную недожизнь.{/n}
"I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Справедливо. Да будет так". {n}Ахиллеас не пытается уклониться от удара, словно сам хочет оборвать свою затянувшуюся извращенную недожизнь.{/n}

languages.text: « Je comprends votre décision. Qu'il en soit ainsi. » {n}Achilleas n'essaie pas d'esquiver votre attaque, comme s'il était impatient d'en finir avec une existence misérable qui n'a déjà que trop duré.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends votre décision. Qu'il en soit ainsi. » {n}Achilleas n'essaie pas d'esquiver votre attaque, comme s'il était impatient d'en finir avec une existence misérable qui n'a déjà que trop duré.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “我不怪您，就这样吧。”{n}阿吉里亚斯并没有试图躲避攻击，似乎一心求死，彻底结束这悲惨而邪恶的漫长人生。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不怪您，就这样吧。”{n}阿吉里亚斯并没有试图躲避攻击，似乎一心求死，彻底结束这悲惨而邪恶的漫长人生。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「私はあなたを責めることはできません。だから好きにしてください」{n}アキレアスはあなたの攻撃をかわそうとしない。まるであまりにも長く、惨めに歪み続けた自らの存在に終止符を打ちたいかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私はあなたを責めることはできません。だから好きにしてください」{n}アキレアスはあなたの攻撃をかわそうとしない。まるであまりにも長く、惨めに歪み続けた自らの存在に終止符を打ちたいかのように。{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ihr tragt daran keine Schuld. So sei es." {n}Achilleas unternimmt keinen Versuch, deinem Angriff auszuweichen, als könne er es kaum erwarten, seine elende, schon viel zu lange andauernde Existenz aufzugeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr tragt daran keine Schuld. So sei es." {n}Achilleas unternimmt keinen Versuch, deinem Angriff auszuweichen, als könne er es kaum erwarten, seine elende, schon viel zu lange andauernde Existenz aufzugeben.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «No le culpo. Sea, pues». {n}Achilleas no hace ningún intento por esquivar tu ataque, como si ansiara poner fin a una grotesca y desdichada existencia que ya se ha prolongado demasiado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No le culpo. Sea, pues». {n}Achilleas no hace ningún intento por esquivar tu ataque, como si ansiara poner fin a una grotesca y desdichada existencia que ya se ha prolongado demasiado.{/n}
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Sizi suçlamıyorum. Kaderime boyun eğeceğim." {n}Achilleas, saldırından kaçınmaya teşebbüs dahi etmiyor. Uzun süredir devam eden, ızdırap dolu, sapkın varlığının sona ermesi için sabırsızlanıyor gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot fault you. So be it." {n}Achilleas makes no attempt to dodge your attack, as if eager to end his twisted, wretched existence that has gone on for too long.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sizi suçlamıyorum. Kaderime boyun eğeceğim." {n}Achilleas, saldırından kaçınmaya teşebbüs dahi etmiyor. Uzun süredir devam eden, ıstırap dolu, sapkın varlığının sona ermesi için sabırsızlanıyor gibi.{/n}
